docs.text: Bugg ¶ Documentation for the Bugg ( bugg.xyz ) real-time eco-acoustic monitoring devices. Please note, Bugg is currently in private preview and not available for general purchase. We are working towards a wider launch, but for now most pages on this website are password protected.
